mapper.select: select * from Quality2 where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Quality2 where name="A线")) )
select * from Quality2 where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Quality2 where name="B线")) )
select * from Quality2 where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Quality2 where name="C线")) )
select * from Quality2 where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Quality2 where name="D线")) )
select * from Quality2 where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="A线")
select * from Quality2 where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="B线")
select * from Quality2 where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="C线")
select * from Quality2 where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="D线")
mapper.insert: insert into Quality2( productionLine, breakpoint, paa, ptr, craft, tools) values (#{productionLine},#{breakpoint},#{paa},#{ptr},#{craft},#{tools})
